scripts.build: make -C clibs && npm run build-zig && tsc
scripts.build-release-debug: rimraf {dist,.zig-cache,.zig-out,tmp} && && (cd clibs && ./build-release.sh) && npm run build-zig -- release debug && tsc
scripts.build-release: rimraf {dist,.zig-cache,.zig-out,tmp} && (cd clibs && ./build-release.sh) && npm run build-zig -- release && tsc
scripts.test-gdb: npm run build && LOCPATH=../locale/locale-x86_64-gnu/locale gdb -ex run --args node ./scripts/test.js
scripts.test-fast-linux_aarch64-schema: podman run --rm -v "$PWD/../..:/usr/src/based-db" based-db-clibs-build-linux_aarch64 sh -c '\. "/usr/local/nvm/nvm.sh"; cd /usr/src/based-db/packages/db; npm run test-fast schemadebug'
scripts.test-fast-linux_aarch64: podman run --rm -v "$PWD/../..:/usr/src/based-db" based-db-clibs-build-linux_aarch64 sh -c '\. "/usr/local/nvm/nvm.sh"; cd /usr/src/based-db/packages/db; npm run test-fast'
scripts.test-fast-linux_aarch64-gdb: podman run --rm -v "$PWD/../..:/usr/src/based-db" based-db-clibs-build-linux_aarch64 sh -c '\. "/usr/local/nvm/nvm.sh"; cd /usr/src/based-db/packages/db; LOCPATH=../locale/locale-x86_64-gnu/locale gdb -ex run --args node ./scripts/test.js'
scripts.test-fast-linux_aarch64-valgrind: podman run --rm -v "$PWD/../..:/usr/src/based-db" based-db-clibs-build-linux_aarch64 sh -c '\. "/usr/local/nvm/nvm.sh"; cd /usr/src/based-db/packages/db; LOCPATH=../locale/locale-aarch64-gnu/locale valgrind --leak-check=full node ./scripts/test.js references:update2'
scripts.test-zig: npm run build-zig && tsc && npm run test-fast
scripts.perf: npm run build && node benchmarks/references.js && node benchmarks/transfermarkt/transfermarkt-based.js
